name: Alan Andrew Varghese

top_projects.name: SmartCanteen
top_projects.description: SmartCanteen is an online system for institutions offering canteen services, featuring standard and personalized options. It tracks users' eating patterns to provide tailored notifications and maintains a Khatta book for users. Admins receive order notifications, helping them identify popular dishes and consider replacing less favored ones.

top_projects.name: freeCodeCamp-Responsive-Web-Design
top_projects.description: This repository contains a collection of projects I built while completing the Responsive Web Design certification from freeCodeCamp. Each project demonstrates key concepts of responsive design, including flexible layouts, media queries, and accessible web development practices.

top_projects.name: javascript-training-projects
top_projects.description: JavaScript projects following the tutorial from freeCodeCamp.org. Link: https://youtu.be/jS4aFq5-91M

readme_content:
# Hi there, I'm Alan 👋

### 💻 About Me

- 🎓 I'm currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Applications (MCA).
- 💡 Passionate about building full-stack applications, with a focus on **Django**, **React**.
- 🌱 I’m constantly learning and improving my skills in web development.
- 📜 Recently, I earned a certification in **Responsive Web Design** from freeCodeCamp.

---

### 📂 Projects

#### SmartCanteen 🍽️ 
> A smart canteen management system built with Django  
- 📜 Offers a user-friendly interface with features such as order placement, feedback, and personalized recommendations.
- 💼 Designed with separate staff and customer modules for efficient canteen management.
- 🔍 Integrated Apriori algorithm for personalized food recommendations.

[GitHub Repository: SmartCanteen](https://github.com/alanandrewvarghese/smartcanteen)
  
---

### 🌐 Connect with Me

- LinkedIn: [Alan Andrew Varghese](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alanandrewvarghese/)
- Email: [alanandrewvarghese@gmail.com](mailto:alanandrewvarghese@gmail.com)

---

### 🛠️ Skills & Tools

- **Languages:** Python, JavaScript
- **Frontend:** HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Responsive Design
- **Backend:** Django
- **Database:** MySQL
- **Tools:** Git, GitHub, VS Code

---

### 🎯 Currently Working On

- Building a **smart canteen project** in Django, with machine learning for personalized recommendations.
---

### 📊 GitHub Stats

![Your GitHub stats](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=alanandrewvarghese&show_icons=true&theme=radical)

---

Thanks for visiting my profile! 😊 Let's build something amazing together!

alanandrewvarghese/SmartCanteen.summary: The repository has witnessed significant activities recently, with multiple push events focused on bug fixes, updates, and enhancements. These include updates to the dashboard, item quantity validation, and improvements to the khattabook and user management systems. Additionally, minor UI fixes and updates to the accounts page have been implemented, along with the completion of forgot password HTML pages and the addition of manage_khattabook.html.

alanandrewvarghese/power-monitor.summary: Recent activities in this repository have centered around enhancing the power monitoring system, with push events aimed at adding navigation, refining graph updates, and incorporating hourly reports. Code refactoring and the addition of charts have also been undertaken, alongside bug fixes to ensure the stability and accuracy of the system.

alanandrewvarghese/flask-portfolio.summary: This repository has seen updates focused on enhancing the portfolio, including the integration of Tailwind and updates to the index.html file. Initial project setup and subsequent refinements suggest ongoing development, with the goal of creating a robust and visually appealing portfolio.

profile_summary: I'm Alan Andrew Varghese, a detail-driven developer pursuing a Master's in Computer Applications, with a strong passion for building full-stack applications using Django and React. With a solid foundation in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, I'm constantly learning and improving my skills in web development, recently earning a certification in Responsive Web Design from freeCodeCamp. I'm excited to collaborate on innovative projects, leveraging my skills and experience to deliver high-quality solutions.
